```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(anytime)
```

## Loading and Cleaning Data
```{r}
full_df = read_csv("./covid_final.csv") %>% 
  mutate(
    date = parse_date_time(x = full_df$date, orders = c("m-d-y", "m/d/y")))
```

## Splitting on April 10th for 70/30 Split
```{r}
test_df = full_df %>% 
  filter(date > "2020-04-10")

write.csv(test_df, file = "./covid_test.csv")

training_df = full_df %>% 
  filter(date < "2020-04-10")

write.csv(training_df, file = "./covid_training.csv")
```
